thread.title: James Foy

author: James Foy
title: James Foy
text:
Great price, very nice quality, quick delivery, easy to deal with.
But I thought I saw somewhere on the website that Legacy would send an email with the final design just before production began, to make doubly sure everything was correct. It is my error but I wish I had changed one word in the Quote: on the stone.
Too late now. "It's etched in stone".
Anyways, I'd recommend you folks to anyone.
Thanks.
Jim
